description: Maximal self-dual antichains on n points.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Daniel E. Loeb, On Games, Voting Schemes and Distributive Lattices. LaBRI Report 625-93, University of Bordeaux I, 1993.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
